articles.author: Sean Lewis, BJ Lutz
articles.title: Mother stabbed in alleged hate crime attack is first witness in case against landlord - WGN TV Chicago
articles.description: Hanaan Shahin, a Palestinian American, was seriously injured and stabbed more than a dozen times in what prosecutors say was a hate crime motivated by fear just days after the Hamas attack on Israel in October 2023.
articles.content: Joseph Czuba faces first-degree murder, attempted murder and hate crime charges stemming from October 2023 attackWILL COUNTY, Ill. (WGN) The first witness called in the case against a man accused of … [+4379 chars]
